params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers.

params.name: intermediate_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (i.e., feed-forward) layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_blocks
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: activation
params.description: The non-linear activation function in the MLPs.

params.name: chunk_size
params.description: The chunk size to create the masks.

params.name: left_chunk
params.description: The left chunk to create the masks.

params.name: dropout_rate
params.description: The dropout ratio.

params.name: ext_pw_out_channel
params.description: Number of out channels in the point-wise conv modules.

params.name: depthwise_seperable_out_channel
params.description: Number of out channels in the depth-wise separable conv modules.

params.name: depthwise_multiplier
params.description: Input size multiplier for the depth-wise separable conv modules.

params.name: kernel_size
params.description: Kernel size for the depth-wise separable conv modules.

params.name: conv_activation
params.description: The non-linear activation function in the conv modules.

params.name: input_size
params.description: Input size for the audio model.

params.name: conv_glu_type
params.description: The non-linear activation function in the point-wise conv modules.

params.name: time_reduction
params.description: Time reduction (subsampling factor).

params.name: bias_max_distance
params.description: Max distance for the relative attention bias module.

params.name: bias_symmetric
params.description: Whether the relative attention bias should be symmetric or not.

params.name: nemo_activation
params.description: The non-linear activation function in the nemo conv modules.

params.name: nemo_conv_channels
params.description: Number of channels in the nemo conv modules.

params.name: downsample_rate
params.description: Downsample rate for the audio feature extractor.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: audio_token_id
params.description: The audio token id.

params.name: feature_layer
params.description: The index of the layer of the encoder from which to extract audio features.
